Function reference

UNHCR Statistics Database

Main Table from Refugee Data Finder - also available on https://data.humdata.org/dataset/unhcr-population-data-for-world

end_year_population_totals
End-year stock population figures for forcibly displaced displaced and stateless persons
end_year_population_totals_long
End-year stock population figures for forcibly displaced displaced and stateless persons - Long Format
demographics
Demographics and locations of forcibly displaced displaced and stateless persons
asylum_applications
Asylum applications by asylum-seekers
asylum_decisions
Asylum decisions taken on asylum claims of asylum-seekers
asylum_decisions_long
Asylum decisions taken on asylum claims of asylum-seekers
solutions
Persons availing a durable solution
solutions_long
Persons availing a durable solution - long format

Data Reference

other Tables conveniently stored here

migrants
International Migrant Stock 1990-2020
reference
reference

Chart for Country

Charts adressing questions at country level

plot_ctr_destination()
Tree map of Population Groups within a country
plot_ctr_diff_in_pop_groups()
Increases and Decreases in Population Groups
plot_ctr_disp_migrant()
Plotting ration Refugee/Asylum seekers vs Migrant within a country
plot_ctr_population_type_abs()
Main country of origin - Absolute value
plot_ctr_population_type_per_year()
Graph of population type per year
plot_ctr_population_type_perc()
Main country of origin - Percentage
plot_ctr_pyramid()
Population Pyramid
plot_ctr_solution()
Plotting solutions within a country
plot_ctr_treemap()
Tree map of Population Groups within a country

Chart for Region

Charts adressing questions at regional or multicountry-level level

plot_reg_decrease()
Plot Biggest decrease in Refugee Population
plot_reg_increase()
Plot Biggest Increase in Refugee Population
plot_reg_map()
Plot a regional map

Report Template

Prebuild Report template to explore, interpret & Disseminate

template_CtryFactsheet()
Generate all country factsheet
template_CtryPrez()
Generate all country factsheet
template_RegFactsheet()
Generate all country factsheet
template_RegPrez()
Generate all country factsheet

Update Data

Refresh the data every 6 months..

update_dataset()
Update the data on the package
